faqs.question: How quickly can I see improvement?
faqs.answer: Our AI tutor is designed to help you improve quickly and efficiently. You can expect to see results within 2-3 weeks of regular use.

faqs.question: What if I'm really behind?
faqs.answer: Don't worry! Our AI tutor is here to support you, regardless of your current level. We'll help you catch up and get back on track.

faqs.question: Is it really free to start?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is! Our platform is free to try, with no credit card required. You can start experiencing the benefits of StudyBuddy today.
